44Panther Premium Logistics 
Safety Highlights
 
Safety measures and policies also apply to all independent contractors, owner-
operators
	
and
	
fleet
	
owners
	
in
	
our
	
Panther
	
fleet.
	
In
	
addition
	
to
	
compliance
	
training
	
r
equired by the FMCSA, we’ve developed safety processes that allow us to monitor 
vehicle compliance and contractor safety performance. We’ve implemented Contractor Safety Awareness and Safety Focus programs to heighten awareness, promote safe driving behaviors, and reduce violations and accidents.
